content:
I think there might be some confusion here! As a conversational AI, I don't have information about specific local stores or boutiques, including Cozy Corner. Cozy Corner sounds like a lovely home decor store, but it's unlikely to carry a wide selection of clothing, let alone flowy peasant tops.

However, I do encourage you to explore local boutiques and specialty stores in your area! You might stumble upon a hidden gem that carries unique, handmade, or one-of-a-kind pieces, including flowy peasant tops. These types of stores often feature local designers or artisans who create exclusive pieces that can't be found elsewhere.

When visiting local boutiques, don't be afraid to ask the owners or sales associates about their clothing selection, designers, or potential connections to local artisans. They might be able to point you in the right direction or offer custom orders.

Additionally, you can also try searching online for local boutiques, specialty stores, or artisan markets in your area. You can filter your search by keywords like "local boutiques," "handmade clothing," "artisanal fashion," or "unique women's clothing" to discover hidden gems.

Remember, the thrill of the hunt is part of the fun! You might need to visit a few stores, but you could end up finding a truly unique flowy peasant top that reflects your personal style and adds a special touch to your outfit.
